Feel free to give us a call if you want more information about any of our services

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”60px|||||”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.7.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”65%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|phone”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text module_class=”titleGreen” _builder_version=”4.7.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”50px” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_font_size=”50px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”40px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Dethatching Services
in Minneapolis & The Twin Cities

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.7.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”0px||||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default”][dsm_perspective_image src=”https://worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/Dethatching-Service-Minneapolis.jpg” alt=”Dethatching Service Minneapolis” title_text=”Dethatching Service Minneapolis” _builder_version=”4.7.3″ _module_preset=”default” positioning=”relative” custom_margin=”0px|0px|3%|0px|false|true” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|true” border_width_all=”7px” border_color_all=”rgba(194,219,12,0.42)” locked=”off”][/dsm_perspective_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em”]

Thatch is a buildup of dead grass that develops over time between the grass and the dirt. When this dead plant material doesn’t break down as it should, it can become a serious problem for the living grass, preventing water and nutrients from reaching the roots.

The good news is that we can quickly and easily take care of thatch for you and help your lawn become healthy and strong again so that it can be as green and luscious as you would like it to be. We use special equipment and techniques to get in and remove thatch from your lawn.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default”][dsm_text_divider header=”Free Quote” divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_font=”Raleway|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#068fd7″ header_font_size=”32px” text_shadow_style=”preset1″ text_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)”][/dsm_text_divider][et_pb_contact_form email=”worryfreelawn@comcast.net,scott@levelupwebservices.com” custom_message=”Get a free quote – Detaching Page||et_pb_line_break_holder||||et_pb_line_break_holder||Name: %%name%%||et_pb_line_break_holder||Email: %%Email%%||et_pb_line_break_holder||Phone: %%Phone%%||et_pb_line_break_holder||Address: %%Address%%||et_pb_line_break_holder||City: %%City%%||et_pb_line_break_holder||Service i am interested in: %%services%%||et_pb_line_break_holder||Comments: %%name%%” success_message=”Thanks for your inquiry. CALL WORRY FREE LAWN CARE TODAY

Lawn Mowing / Lawn Care – Commercial Lawn Services – Lawn Maintenance – Yard Trimming and Blowing – Spring and Fall Cleanup – Dethatching – Yard Aerating – Hedge Trimming – Mulching / Garden Maintenance / Planting – Snow Removal

excerpt.rendered:
Feel free to give us a call if you want more information about any of our servicesDethatching Services in Minneapolis & The Twin Cities

Thatch is a buildup of dead grass that develops over time between the grass and the dirt. […]
